about_the_game:
Vigilancer 2099 is a third-person open-world cyberpunk bounty hunting game where you step in the shoes of a Vigilancer. Customize your look, cybernetics, and play style to best suit your survival tactics. Traverse the densely packed Megabuilding that's a host to all manner of humans, robots, and aliens alike. Take on bounty gigs to earn your credits and decide whether to spend that money on reducing your outstanding debt or use it to customize yourself further to make navigating the hostile terrain a little more bearable. It's a tough world with only two options: Buy your life back or Die trying!

STORY:
Days after taking down a notorious bounty target, your Megabuilding goes into lock down. A lot of mystery and turmoil in the air as to what caused the lock down. Before you know it, there's a bounty put on your head – with no escape. Your only options are to pay off the huge debt or get collected.

Limitless Bounty Targets
Thanks to our top-of-the-line auto bounty generation, you can take as many bounty jobs as you want. All various and different. You have the freedom to lose bounty assignments with no game-over. Endless play opportunity.

Explore the Megabuilding
Explore the lovingly handcrafted Megabuilding. The vertical design allows for intense tactical combat and strategies. Get a glimpse of the Megabuilding tumultuous history through environmental storytelling.

In-depth Customization
Customizes your character as much or as little as you want. Customizations not only affects play style and the aesthetics of your character, but also how NPCs respond and react to you.

content_descriptors.notes: Futuristic drug use for health and strength. Violence in the form of shooting for hunting down bounty targets.
